channel.title: ~*Help Here Please OMG*~
channel.description:
Simple Question, I Need To Know How To Make A Certain Npc Drop An Item When They Die. Iv'e Tried Putting In NpcDrops.cfg, And didn't Work. Iv'e Also Noticed That Some Of My Npcs That Drop Things Arn't Even In There. *Example* A Lesser Demon In My Server That Drops a Dragon Long And Other Dragon Weapons, It's Not In NpcDrops.cfg. So Where Are They Actually Stored? So...Yeah..WTF?
Any Help Appreciated :)

item.title: ~*Help Here Please OMG*~
item.dc:creator: @Fuzzy_Ranqe Fuzzy Ranqe
item.description:
@Fuzzy_Ranqe wrote:

Ok Thanks, One More Question Umm Say I Want A Chiken(41) To Drop a White Party Hat(1048) I Have The Chicken Spawned In The Place I Want So How Do I Make It Drop It. Because I Have No Idea Where What To Search For Or Plain Out Do…

Read full topic

item.title: ~*Help Here Please OMG*~
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

They’re stored in one of your item files and npchandler.

Read full topic
